name: bsa
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool clinicalmarkers.
Tool description: Easy calculation of clinical markers for medical applications.
API description: Calculates the Body Surface Area (BSA) based on weight and height using an external API.

weightinkilograms.description: The weight of the individual in kilograms.

heightincentrimetres.description: The height of the individual in centimeters.
